basic.description: This course explores the systematics, ecology, and evolution of fishes, amphibians, and reptiles.
basic.subject: ZOO
basic.title: Biology of the Lower Vertebrates

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, and CHM 1046L.
